component.attributes:
&widget_var_attribute;
id true java.lang.String Client ID of this form layout.
modes false java.lang.String all Indicates what modes this form supports. Must be one of view, edit, or all.
currentMode false java.lang.String view Indicates the current mode of the form. Must be either view or edit.
separateElements false java.lang.Boolean false Indicates if a horizontal separator should be placed in between form fields.
maxWidth false java.lang.String Maximum width of the entire form.
fieldStyle false java.lang.String Optional style for the field container.
fieldStyleMap false java.lang.String Optional map from device type to style for the field container. Overrides the style attribute.
fieldStyleClass false java.lang.String Optional style class for the field container.
fieldStyleClassMap false java.lang.String Optional map from device type to style class for the field container. Overrides the styleClass attribute.
titleStyleClass false java.lang.String Default style class for all field titles
textStyleClass false java.lang.String Optional style class to be applied to all value (not title) elements containing text.
formStyleClass false java.lang.String Optional style class to be applied to the form container object.
width false java.lang.String String width attribute applied to the outer div of the entire layout.
height false java.lang.String String height attribute applied to the outer div of the entire layout.
fullScreen false java.lang.Boolean false Indicates if this is a full screen layout or not (default).
useMiniLayout false java.lang.String Map from device type to boolean indicating if a mini layout should be used. Add "all" to the map to always use the mini layout.
